Grouped_Utterances: I’d like to talk more about my guilt regarding my kids.  I just feel like I should be doing more for them, but I’m stuck here. I guess I just want to be more present in their lives, even from a distance.
Yes, I’ve been doing it every day. It really helps clear my head.
I think that’s all for now. I feel better after talking about it.

Maybe I could send them letters or little care packages. I could send them some of their favorite snacks or little toys.  They’d probably be excited. I know they love surprises. It sounds like this could be a great way to strengthen your bond. Would you like to set a goal around sending them something this week? Yes, I’d like to do that. That’s wonderful! Let’s say you aim to send a care package by the end of the week. Does that work for you? Yes, that sounds good.
